Ahold O
launches O
Asian O
food O
discount O
stores O
. O

ZAANDAM O
, O
Netherlands O
1996-12-06 O

Dutch O
supermarkets O
group O
Ahold O
NV O
said O
on O
Friday O
it O
had O
launched O
a O
second O
food O
store O
format O
for O
Asian O
consumers O
today O
, O
opening O
16 O
BILO O
food O
discount O
stores O
in O
Malaysia O
. O

The O
BILO O
stores O
are O
located O
in O
Malysia O
's O
capital O
Kuala O
Lumpur O
and O
in O
the O
country O
's O
second O
city O
Johor O
Bahru O
. O

The O
discount O
price O
format O
store O
BILO O
is O
to O
complement O
Ahold O
's O
full O
service O
supermarket O
TOPS O
, O
recently O
launched O
in O
Asia O
. O

" O
In O
the O
coming O
five O
to O
ten O
years O
, O
Ahold O
plans O
to O
open O
many O
more O
stores O
of O
both O
formats O
, O
making O
TOPS O
and O
BILO O
household O
names O
in O
the O
region O
, O
" O
Ahold O
said O
in O
a O
statement O
. O

As O
well O
as O
its O
activities O
in O
Asia O
, O
Dutch O
retail O
group O
Ahold O
has O
a O
strong O
presence O
in O
Europe O
, O
in O
the O
U.S. O
and O
the O
company O
recently O
announced O
a O
joint O
venture O
agreement O
in O
Brazil O
. O

Ahold O
has O
annualised O

approximately O
US$ O
24 O
billion O
, O
and O
employs O
180,000 O
people O
worldwide O
. O

20 O

- O

OF O
JCPENNEY O

OUT O
. O

TARPON O
SPRINGS O
, O
Florida O
1996-12-07 O

Heavy O
rains O
on O
Saturday O
washed O
out O
the O
third O
round O
of O
the O
$ O
1.5 O
million O
JCPenney O
Classic O
at O
the O
Innisbrook O
Hilton O
Resort O
. O

Officials O
said O
the O
tournament O
would O
be O
reduced O
to O
54 O
holes O
for O
the O
first O
time O
in O
its O
37-year O
history O
. O

The O
final O
round O
of O
the O
special O
event O
, O
which O
pairs O
players O
from O
the O
PGA O
and O
LPGA O
Tours O
, O
will O
be O
played O
in O
the O
alternate O
shot O
format O
on O
Sunday O
. O

The O
duo O
of O
Pat B-PERSON
Hurst E-PERSON
and O
Scott B-PERSON
McCarron E-PERSON
were O
tied O
for O
the O
lead O
with O
the O
team O
of O
Donna B-PERSON
Andrews E-PERSON
and O
Mike B-PERSON
Hulbert E-PERSON
at O
13-under-par O
129 O
through O
36 O
holes O
. O

The O
tandem O
of O
reigning O
U.S. O
Amateur O
champions O
Kelli B-PERSON
Kuehne E-PERSON
and O
Tiger B-PERSON
Woods E-PERSON
were O
another O
shot O
back O
at O
12-under O
130 O
. O

champions O
Beth B-PERSON

and O
Davis B-PERSON

will O
start O
the O
final O
round O
six O
shots O
off O
the O
pace O
. O

CRICKET O
- O
WOOLMER S-PERSON
MAKES O
SENTIMENTAL O
RETURN O
TO O
KANPUR O
. O

KANPUR O
, O
India O
1996-12-07 O

South O
Africa O
's O
trip O
to O
Kanpur O
for O
the O
third O
test O
against O
India O
has O
given O
former O
England O
test O
cricketer O
Bob B-PERSON
Woolmer E-PERSON
the O
chance O
of O
a O
sentimental O
return O
to O
his O
birthplace O
. O

Woolmer S-PERSON
was O
born O
in O
the O
northern O
city O
of O
Kanpur O
when O
his O
father O
worked O
there O
for O
an O
insurance O
compnay O
and O
was O
himself O
an O
active O
cricketer O
. O

" O
It O
's O
been O
a O
sentimental O
journey O
... O

A O
visit O
to O
India O
is O
always O
an O
intriguing O
experience O
, O
" O
Woolmer S-PERSON
, O
now O
the O
South O
African O
coach O
, O
said O
on O
Saturday O
. O

Woolmer S-PERSON
, O
48 O
, O
played O
19 O
tests O
for O
England O
between O
1975 O
and O
1981 O
. O

His O
first O
cricketing O
sojurn O
to O
India O
was O
as O
a O
member O
of O
Tony B-PERSON
Greig E-PERSON
's O
England O
side O
in O
1976-77 O
. O

His O
father O
Clarence B-PERSON
Woolmer E-PERSON
represented O
United O
Province O
, O
now O
renamed O
Uttar O
Pradesh O
, O
in O
India O
's O
Ranji O
Trophy O
national O
championship O
and O
captained O
the O
state O
during O
1949 O
. O

Now O
aged O
86 O
, O
Woolmer S-PERSON
senior O
lives O
with O
his O
son O
in O
Cape O
Town O
. O

Woolmer S-PERSON
's O
memories O
of O
Kanpur O
are O
few O
and O
blurred O
. O

" O
I O
do O
n't O
remember O
much O
of O
the O
place O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O
" O

I O
came O
here O
on O
zero O
and O
left O
at O
three O
( O
aged O
three O
) O
when O
my O
father O
was O
transferred O
to O
Calcutta O
where O
I O
spent O
another O
four O
and O
half O
years O
. O

" O
But O
I O
do O
remember O
we O
had O
a O
cobra O
snake O
in O
the O
basement O
of O
our O
house O
. O

Also O
that O
my O
father O
bought O
a O
bicycle O
and O
when O
we O
rode O
over O
a O
hose O
pipe O
it O
broke O
into O
two O
. O
" O

Woolmer S-PERSON
said O
the O
hospital O
where O
he O
was O
born O
is O
close O
to O
the O
stadium O
where O
the O
India-South O
Africa O
test O
will O
be O
played O
. O

ALPINE O
SKIING-OFFICIALS O
HOPE O
TO O
SALVAGE O
WORLD O
CUP O
WEEKEND O
. O

WHISTLER O
, O
British O
Columbia O
1996-12-06 O

World O
Cup O
ski O
officials O
hope O
to O
be O
able O
to O
get O
in O
at O
least O
one O
men O
's O
downhill O
training O
run O
on O
Saturday O
in O
an O
effort O
to O
salvage O
the O
weekend O
racing O
programme O
. O

For O
the O
third O
consecutive O
day O
, O
Friday O
's O
scheduled O
training O
runs O
were O
cancelled O
due O
to O
heavy O
wet O
snow O
and O
fog O
on O
Whistler O
Mountain O
, O
leaving O
the O
scheduled O
World O
Cup O
events O
in O
jeopardy O
. O

Rules O
call O
for O
at O
least O
one O
training O
run O
to O
be O
completed O
before O
a O
World O
Cup O
downhill O
race O
can O
be O
staged O
. O

Organisers O
hope O
to O
get O
that O
run O
in O
on O
Saturday O
morning O
, O
conditions O
permitting O
, O
and O
stage O
the O
race O
later O
in O
the O
day O
or O
on O
Sunday O
. O

" O
There O
was O
no O
possibility O
today O
to O
make O
a O
training O
run O
, O
" O
said O
Bernd B-PERSON
Zobel E-PERSON
, O
the O
Canadian O
men O
's O
national O
coach O
, O
citing O
too O
much O
new O
snow O
and O
poor O
visibility O
. O

If O
organisers O
are O
forced O
to O
run O
the O
downhill O
on O
Sunday O
, O
the O
super-giant O
slalom O
originally O
scheduled O
for O
Sunday O
would O
likely O
be O
abandoned O
. O

Vieira E-PERSON
blasted O
a O
last-minute O

to O

a O
2-2 O
draw O
for O
English O
premier O
league O

Arsenal O
at O
home O
to O
Derby O
on O
Saturday O
. O

London O
club O
had O
been O
rocked O
by O
a O

burst O
from O
forwards O
Dean B-PERSON
Sturridge E-PERSON

in O

which O
overturned O

's O

from O
a O

by O

the O

of O

. O

of O
the O
season O

1-0 O
by O

for O

Wednesday O
. O

RUGBY O
UNION O
- O
CAMPESE S-PERSON
SIGNS O
OFF O
WITH O
TRY O
IN O
WALLABY O
ROMP O
. O

LONDON O
1996-12-07 O

Australia O
bade O
farewell O
to O
David B-PERSON
Campese E-PERSON
in O
spectacular O
fashion O
by O
overwhelming O
the O
Barbarians O
39-12 O
in O
the O
final O
match O
of O
their O
European O
tour O
at O
Twickenham O
on O
Saturday O
. O

The O
Wallabies O
ran O
in O
five O
tries O
with O
Campese S-PERSON
, O
who O
has O
retired O
from O
test O
rugby O
after O
collecting O
101 O
caps O
and O
a O
world O
record O
64 O
tries O
, O
adding O
one O
last O
touchdown O
in O
a O
Wallaby O
jersey O
before O
departing O
the O
international O
game O
. O

The O
Barbarians O
included O
14 O
internationals O
but O
, O
with O
only O
two O
pre-match O
practice O
sessions O
behind O
them O
, O
proved O
no O
real O
match O
for O
a O
Wallaby O
side O
determined O
to O
finish O
their O
12-match O
tour O
unbeaten O
. O

The O
touring O
team O
were O
27-0 O
ahead O
by O
half-time O
before O
easing O
up O
in O
the O
second-half O
. O

Matthew B-PERSON
Burke E-PERSON
finished O
with O
a O
personal O
haul O
of O
24 O
points O
to O
take O
his O
tour O
aggregate O
to O
136 O
. O

SOCCER O
- O
ENGLISHMAN O
CHARLTON S-PERSON
IS O
MADE O
AN O
HONORARY O
IRISHMAN O
. O

DUBLIN O
1996-12-07 O

Jack B-PERSON
Charlton E-PERSON
's O
relationship O
with O
the O
people O
of O
Ireland O
was O
cemented O
on O
Saturday O
when O
the O
Englishman O
was O
officially O
declared O
one O
of O
their O
own O
. O

Charlton S-PERSON
, O
61 O
, O
and O
his O
wife O
, O
Peggy S-PERSON
, O
became O
citizens O
of O
Ireland O
when O
they O
formally O
received O
Irish O
passports O
from O
deputy O
Prime O
Minister O
Dick B-PERSON
Spring E-PERSON
who O
said O
the O
honour O
had O
been O
made O
in O
recognition O
of O
Charlton S-PERSON
's O
achievements O
as O
the O
national O
soccer O
manager O
. O

" O
The O
years O
I O
spent O
as O
manager O
of O
the O
Republic O
of O
Ireland O
were O
the O
best O
years O
of O
my O
life O
. O

It O
all O
culminated O
in O
the O
fact O
that O
I O
now O
have O
lots O
of O
great O
, O
great O
friends O
in O
Ireland O
. O

That O
is O
why O
this O
is O
so O
emotional O
a O
night O
for O
me O
, O
" O
Charlton S-PERSON
said O
. O

" O
It O
was O
the O
joy O
that O
we O
all O
had O
over O
the O
period O
, O
that O
I O
shared O
with O
people O
that O
I O
grew O
to O
love O
, O
that O
I O
treasure O
most O
, O
" O
he O
added O
. O

Charlton S-PERSON
managed O
Ireland O
for O
93 O
matches O
, O
during O
which O
time O
they O
lost O
only O
17 O
times O
in O
almost O
10 O
years O
until O
he O
resigned O
in O
December O
1995 O
. O

He O
guided O
Ireland O
to O
two O
successive O
World O
Cup O
finals O
tournaments O
and O
to O
the O
1988 O
European O
championship O
finals O
in O
Germany O
, O
after O
the O
Irish O
beat O
a O
well-fancied O
England O
team O
1-0 O
in O
their O
group O
qualifier O
. O

The O
lanky O
former O
Leeds O
United O
defender O
did O
not O
make O
his O
England O
debut O
until O
the O
age O
of O
30 O
but O
eventually O
won O
35 O
caps O
and O
was O
a O
key O
member O
of O
the O
1966 O
World O
Cup O
winning O
team O
with O
his O
younger O
brother O
, O
Bobby S-PERSON
. O
